attributes.title: Animal Welfare Approved
attributes.description:
Created on March 28, 2011 by segjx175 on Sourcemap.org:

This map does not really have a point of assembly.  It is a map about different farms that are certified by the organization called animal welfare approved.  The two main farms are located in New York and New Jersey, and Animal Welfare approved sends auditors to these cites for certification of their animal products.

attributes.name: Animal Welfare Approved

The two main farms are located in New York and New Jersey, and Animal Welfare approved sends auditors to these cites for certification of their animal products.

attributes.name: Highview Farm
attributes.1: 166 Monmouth Rd, North Hanover, NJ 08562, USA
attributes.address: 166 Monmouth Rd, North Hanover, NJ 08562, USA
attributes.title: Highview Farm
attributes.description: Highview farm produces meat from lamb, sheep, and pig.  They also produce eggs and wool.  They also board horses.  They are approved by Animal Welfare Approved

attributes.name: Kevin Ford- Master Shearer
attributes.title: Kevin Ford- Master Shearer
attributes.description: Kevin Ford comes all along the east coast and stops at various farms (including highview) to carry out humane shearing and is known as a master shearer.

attributes.name: The Yarn Tree
attributes.title: The Yarn Tree
attributes.description: The Yarn Tree takes Yarn and lamb meat from highview farms and sells it to conscientious shoppers in Brookyln.
